extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system a single user system where restricting access rights is not necessary?

extracted_playbook.title: Use PC WORX SRT on Single User Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that PC WORX SRT is used only on single user systems where restricting access rights is not necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Protection Measures Against Unauthorized Access
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the recommended protection measures against unauthorized access for network-compatible devices, solutions, and PC-based software as detailed in the application note.
